segments.text: Excuse me , I want to know the price of your CPU .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Glad to tell you . The price of CPU is 300 dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's rather too high . If you can make it cheaper , we will be able to place large orders continuously .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you order a large amount , we can give you a discount .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , can you explain it to me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The price of CPU is 260 dollars above 1,000 Units .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , but to be frank , considering exploiting the market in your country , we have already supplied you at very low preferential price .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In that case , we have to stop ordering if a reduction can't be made . Please reconsider .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is so hard to deal with .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you can give us a more reduction , We'd be able to give you an order on the spot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This price is the best we can make .
segments.speaker: S2
